sigIn.title: Join to personalize your IHR
sigIn.mailWillBeSent: An email will be sent to your address to confirm your account.
sigIn.missingReCaptcha: You need to click on "i'm not a robot" button.
sigIn.passwordTooWeak: Your password is too weak. Use at least 8 characters.
sigIn.strangeEmail: Your email is usual. If you know what you're doing then submit again.
sigIn.pleaseFollowTheLink: please follow instructions in the email to activate you account

accountActivation.title: account validation page
accountActivation.signIntoValidate: Please sign in here to validate
accountActivation.goAway: This is the page for activate account. Please visit other pages or sign up.
accountActivation.tokenInvalid: Your activation token seams to be invalid, please follow the link in your email. If you followed it, you should contact the administrator
accountActivation.validationInProgress: Your account validation is in progress should take a few seconds
accountActivation.alreadyValidated: This account has already been validated, please login using the button sign in located in the upper bar

resetPassword.title: Forgot your password?
resetPassword.fillToChange: fill the form to change your password
resetPassword.instructionPart2: follow the instructions in the email to reset your password
resetPassword.errorAreYouRobot: check the button! Or are you a robot?
resetPassword.errorInvalidPassword: invalid password, please use a safer option
resetPassword.youAreLoggedIn: you are logged in, click the button for your personal page

personalPage.title: personal page
personalPage.confirmYourEmail: you need to confirm your email (following the instruction we sent to your new email) before we apply that change
personalPage.changesNotApplied: Something went wrong, no changes has been made
personalPage.goAway: You must be logged in to access this page. login or visit other pages, if you are new sign up!
personalPage.settingInstruction: here you can manage your setting for notification for AS events.
personalPage.noAsnMonitored: You don't have AS under monitoring

notifyLevelExplanation.low: you will receive notification for all kind of events
notifyLevelExplanation.moderate: you will receive notification for events of medium entity and critical events
notifyLevelExplanation.high: you will receive only critical events notification
